definitions: in a way that expresses disapproval

examples.text: a designer spoke critically of capitalism

definitions: in a way that expresses or involves an analysis of the merits and faults of a work of literature, music, or art
shortDefinitions: in way that involves analysis of work of literature etc.

definitions: in a way that involves the objective analysis and evaluation of an issue in order to form a judgment

examples.text: the reader must evaluate critically every article he or she reviews

shortDefinitions: in way that involves objective analysis and evaluation of issue in order to form judgement

examples.text: the critically endangered Hawaiian monk seal

definitions: to an extreme degree with a risk of death

examples.text: two critically wounded people died in the hospital
critically ill patients who were awaiting surgery

shortDefinitions: to extreme degree with risk of death

definitions: with decisive or crucial importance in the success, failure, or existence of something

examples.text: the livelihood of rural people critically depends on the use of natural resources

shortDefinitions: with decisive or crucial importance in success or failure of something
